value.halfverse: for his mercy endures for ever.
value.verse:
Hallelujah!
Give thanks to the LORD, for he is good, *

value.halfverse: or show forth all his praise?
value.verse: Who can declare the mighty acts of the LORD *

value.halfverse: and always do what is right!
value.verse: Happy are those who act with justice *

value.halfverse: and visit me with your saving help;
value.verse: Remember me, O LORD, with the favor you have for your people, *

That I may see the prosperity of your elect
and be glad with the gladness of your people, *
value.halfverse: that I may glory with your inheritance.

value.verse: We have sinned as our forebears did; *
value.halfverse: we have done wrong and dealt wickedly.

value.verse:
In Egypt they did not consider your marvelous works,
nor remember the abundance of your love; *
value.halfverse: they defied the Most High at the Red Sea.

value.verse: But he saved them for his Nameâ€™s sake, *

value.halfverse: and he led them through the deep as through a desert.
value.verse: He rebuked the Red Sea, and it dried up, *
He saved them from the hand of those who hated them *
value.halfverse: and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.
not one of them was left.
and sang him songs of praise.

value.verse: But they soon forgot his deeds *
value.halfverse: and did not wait for his counsel.
and they put God to the test in the desert.
value.verse: A craving seized them in the wilderness, *

value.halfverse: but sent leanness into their soul.
value.verse: He gave them what they asked, *
They envied Moses in the camp, *
value.halfverse: and Aaron, the holy one of the LORD.

value.verse: The earth opened and swallowed Dathan *
value.halfverse: and covered the company of Abiram.

value.verse: Fire blazed up against their company, *
